mapper.insert: insert into USERS (name, password, mail, createDate) VALUES (#{name}, #{password}, #{mail}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT USERS.id, USERS.name, TRAFFIC.trafficid, TRAFFIC.userid, TRAFFIC.useday, TRAFFIC.means, TRAFFIC.secter, TRAFFIC.road, TRAFFIC.cost FROM USERS LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC ON USERS.id = TRAFFIC.userid WHERE USERS.id = #{id}

SELECT USERS.id, USERS.name, TRAFFIC.trafficid, TRAFFIC.userid, TRAFFIC.useday, TRAFFIC.means, TRAFFIC.secter, TRAFFIC.road, TRAFFIC.cost FROM USERS LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC ON USERS.id = TRAFFIC.userid WHERE USERS.id = #{id} AND YEAR(TRAFFIC.useday) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(TRAFFIC.useday) = MONTH(CURDATE());

SELECT USERS.id, USERS.name, TRAFFIC.trafficid, TRAFFIC.userid, TRAFFIC.useday, TRAFFIC.means, TRAFFIC.secter, TRAFFIC.road, TRAFFIC.cost FROM USERS LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC ON USERS.id = TRAFFIC.userid WHERE USERS.id = #{id} AND YEAR(TRAFFIC.useday) = #{year} AND MONTH(TRAFFIC.useday) = #{month}
